divs: Sighting DetailsI am 38 years old and have 2 teenageboys we went to penticton for a holiday we stayed at a motel called Stardust.My older son took a few pictures of the mountains outside. later that night he was looking at the pictures he took and noticed an object he zoomed in on the object and sure enough it is a u.f.o cone shaped.The next day as we were checking out he saw the cone again and took 2 more pictures as it flew straight up and into the clouds.So we drove up this mountain as far as we could but found that there no more and I was scared of what we might find so we left.The pictures are pretty good.I do not know how to send pictures but if you are interested I will get my son to send them let me know
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Penticton
There were no other sightings in Penticton on or around August 17th 2007
